title: Tiramisu
steps: Beat egg yolks with sugar until pale and thick. Fold in mascarpone until smooth.
Whip egg whites to stiff peaks; fold gently into mascarpone mixture.
Combine coffee and liqueur. Quickly dip ladyfingers and layer in dish.
Spread half the mascarpone mixture. Repeat with another layer of dipped ladyfingers and remaining cream.
Cover and chill at least 4 hours (overnight best). Dust with cocoa before serving.
